text:
I want to know, exactly what treatments are people getting, in which countries, what are the outcomes - why can't they add that into the news broadcasts, too? 

I feel like there's a tremendous resistance to using potentially life-saving drugs #antivirals #chloroquine + #Zpak 🙏 https://t.co/PCuzzLRQPG https://t.co/ESYSvql2Uo
